unit.data.tracker.name: Tracker
unit.data.tracker.lore: Some adventurers from the land of the Mousefolks with a keen nose and great sense of orientation. They are ideal explorers and will scout for the best roads and tracks when in their natural habitat.
unit.data.tracker.combo.0: Move<sprite name="card_icon_move"><style="value">2</style>. Move cost of Forests, Hills and Swamps is <style="status">Reduced by 1</style> this turn
unit.data.tracker.description.visuals: Small mouse, size of a child. Carrying a backpack and wearing a light green tunic and a helmet with tree leaves growing out of it. The mouse uses a bamboo walking stick and a short sword.
